1.heading: Mali.
1.title: Trau Keinem über 30!
1.author: herausgegeben von Andreas C
1.appears_in: Knigge ; mit einem Nachwort von Friedemann Bedürftig.
notes: Historical comic about the student movement in Germany, with contributions by Gerhard Seyfried, Erich Rauschenbach, Harald Juch, Robert Gernhardt, Ziska, Chlodwig Poth, Peter Butschkow, Mali & Werner, Hans Traxler, Gabriel Nemeth, Ralf König, Freimut Wössner, Rainer Hachfeld, Hilke Raddatz, Johan Kiefersauer, Ulf Harten, Tomas Bunk, Franziska Becker, Marie Marcks, Volker Reiche, and Alfred von Meysenbug.

2.heading: Mali.

2.author: un récit de Christophe Dabitch ; dessin et couleur de Jean-Denis Pendanx.

8.heading: Mali.
8.title: Sundiata : a Legend of Africa
8.author: adapted by Will Eisner.
notes: Summary: A retelling in comic strip form of the African epic in which an ugly, crippled child grows up to become the liberator and founder of the great empire of old Mali (Soundiata Keita, who died in 1255).
